James Francis Hardy (April 24, 1923 – August 16, 2019) was an American football quarterback. He was born in Los Angeles, California. Hardy was known for playing with the Los Angeles Rams from 1946 through 1948, the Chicago Cardinals from 1949 through 1951 and for the Detroit Tigers in 1952.
Hardy died on August 16, 2019 in La Quinta, California at the age of 96.
